channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Wufoo Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Wufoo Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2022-4679|2024-08-03T01:48:39.517Z -- unknown -- wufoo%20shortcode
item.description: The Wufoo Shortcode WordPress plugin before 1.52 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
